description: Scopri i migliori hotel a Toronto, Canada. Trova offerte esclusive e alloggi di lusso.

hotels.title: Charming Heritage Toronto Downtown Escape with Onsite Cafe, Bar & Tranquil Spa
hotels.description: Immerse yourself in the charms of Edwardian-era opulence at this legendary sanctuary nestled in downtown Toronto's heart. Built in 1903, the elegant hotel has been reimagined for the 21st century and offers a regal taste of luxury, with its spacious, sophisticated rooms and top-notch amenities. Indulge in chef-prepared delicacies at Victoria Café, enjoy a classic afternoon tea experience and sip on signature cocktails at the Consort Bar, emanating an atmosphere reminiscent of an English aristocrats’ club and get pampered at Mokara Spa. If you wish to step out, you can stroll along the scenic harbourfront and splurge away at the nearby St. Lawrence Market and Eaton Centre.

hotels.title: Eclectic Escape in the Heart of Toronto with Onsite Restaurant
hotels.description: With a prime location in Toronto's buzzing Bloor-Yorkville neighbourhood, Kimpton Saint George Hotel, an IHG Hotel offers a sophisticated blend of stylish design and attentive service. Whether you're travelling for business or pleasure, this urban retreat offers everything you need for the ideal city escape. Unwind with a Canadian whisky at onsite gatropub, The Fortunate Fox, or hop on a bicycle to explore the bustling streets of Ontario's capital.

hotels.title: Modern Toronto Airport Stay 25 Minutes from Downtown with Onsite Restaurant & Indoor Pool
hotels.description: Explore Canada's largest city with a stay at Crowne Plaza Toronto Airport, an IHG Hotel. This hotel offers guests easy access to the city's bustling downtown and museums via the UP Express Train, and is only 10 minutes from Toronto Pearson International Airport. After days spent exploring, unwind in the hotel's indoor pool, savour international cuisine at The Cannery Kitchen & Social, or venture out to explore Toronto's world-renowned culinary scene.

hotels.title: Five-Star Shangri-La Toronto City Break with University Avenue Views
hotels.description: Soaring high above the city in one of Toronto's tallest buildings, close to high-end shopping and a wide range of restaurants, Shangri-La Toronto offers an opulent city sanctuary inspired by traditional Asian influences. This city haven, ideally positioned near the Osgoode subway station for easy access to key transport junctions, features elegant décor and panoramic views of University Avenue. Of course, you'll have to visit Lobby Lounge, affectionately called Toronto's urban living room, where you can sip your favourite tipple while relaxing by the cosy fireplace and Italian handcrafted Fazioli piano. Expect nothing less than first-class facilities when you go beyond the palatial lobby and discover a restorative health club, home to a 20-metre lap pool underneath a glass roof and a state-of-the-art fitness centre.

hotels.title: Modern Downtown Toronto InterContinental Retreat near Financial & Theatre Districts
hotels.description: Take the downtown city sights to new heights with a stay at the InterContinental Toronto Centre, an IHG Hotel, a contemporary escape close to Toronto's bustling financial and theatre districts. Indulge in a tranquil warm stone massage at the renowned Spa InterContinental or enjoy a decadent lunch inspired by local cuisine at Azure Restaurant and Bar. For an inspiring night out, explore the vibrant theatres, stunning architecture, and world-class dining options on your doorstep.

hotels.title: Downtown Toronto Landmark Retreat near CN Tower with Indoor Pool & Three Bars and Restaurants
hotels.description: A timeless emblem of luxury since 1929. From the moment you step into the lobby with hand-painted ceilings and crystal chandeliers, you're transported to an era of classic elegance. Whether you're dining or drinking at some of Toronto's best bars and restaurants or unwinding in the health club and pool, this hotel has welcomed royalty, celebrities and discerning travellers for nearly a century. Perfectly positioned in downtown Toronto's most coveted district, the Fairmont Royal York is moments from the action. Take in the views from the CN Tower, explore the Harbourfront on the tranquil shores of Lake Ontario, or wander the cobblestone streets of the historic Distillery District. Shopping enthusiasts can also explore the PATH system's underground world of boutiques.

hotels.title: Scenic Parkland Escape 25-Minutes from Downtown Toronto with Outdoor Pool & Tennis Court
hotels.description: Situated among 15 acres of verdant parkland by the Don River, get the best of both worlds at this Toronto retreat perfectly placed just a short drive from the city centre. Savour a gourmet meal at Seasons Restaurant, make a splash in the outdoor pool and practise your serve at the onsite tennis court. Make the most of the serene greenery around you and wander the Don River Ravine Forest Trail, and when it's time to venture out, experience cosmopolitan Toronto's best attractions like the Royal Ontario Museum, the CN Tower and Casa Loma, all within a half-hour drive.
